mapper.select: select id, type, num, image_url, image_sorting from batch_exam_toeic_image where type = #{type} and num = #{num} order by image_sorting
mapper.insert: insert into batch_exam_toeic_image ( created, created_id, modified, modified_id, type, num, image_url, image_sorting )values( now(), #{created_id}, now(), #{modified_id}, #{type}, #{num}, #{image_url}, #{image_sorting} )
